cve.summary: No recent vulnerabilities were found for 1Password in the last 120 days.

incident.summary: No confirmed security incidents, controversies, or public advisories were found for 1Password in the provided search results.

items.name: Bitwarden
items.reason: Bitwarden is a popular open-source password manager that offers a strong set of features for individuals and businesses. It is known for its security and affordability.

items.name: LastPass
items.reason: LastPass is a well-established password manager with a wide range of features, including password generation, secure sharing, and multi-factor authentication. It is suitable for both personal and business use.

items.name: Dashlane
items.reason: Dashlane is a comprehensive password manager that provides features like password management, VPN, dark web monitoring, and identity protection. It is a good option for users looking for an all-in-one solution.

key_strengths: Supports SSO, MFA, and SCIM for robust authentication and access control.
Encrypts data both at rest and in transit.
Offers Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) and audit logs for administrative oversight.
Provides options for both SaaS and self-hosted deployment models.
No recent vulnerabilities reported in the last 120 days.
No confirmed security incidents or public advisories found.
key_risks: Specific details on key management practices are not provided.
Information regarding zero-knowledge architecture is not available.

Compliance certifications and specific data residency details are not listed.
